summary: Set in modern day Milan, this is a Chaplinesque odyssey through the world of work - every type of work, but primarily unskilled manual labor, seen through the eyes of a kind, middle-aged ... See full summary »
cast: Antonio Albanese|Livia Rossi|Gabriele Rendina|Xu Wei-you|Alfonso Santagata|Sandra Ceccarelli|Giuseppe Antignati|Nicola Specchio|Gianluca Cesale|Niccolò Collivignarelli|Fabio Zulli|Bedy Moratti|Aldina Teresa Bossi|Fausto Rossi|Enzo Ferrari|Angelo Costabile|Olga Re|Donatella Bartoli|Giuseppe Aldino|Flora Cinelli|Matteo Silla|Federico Tolardo|Matteo Vignati|Hamada El Kilani|Emiliana Perina|Sokol Togi|Ismaili Agim|Endrik Beba|Renato Rexha|Eno Milkani
title: L'intrepido
